text: tum unamen se jise chaaho apane se alag rakho aur jise chaaho apane paas rakho, aur jinako tumane alag rakha ho, unamen se kisee ke ichchhuk ho to isamen tumapar koee dosh nahin, isase is baat kee adhik sambhaavana hai ki unakee aankhen thandee rahen aur ve shokaakul na hon aur jo kuchh tum unhen do usapar ve raazee rahen. allaah jaanata hai jo kuchh tumhaare dilon mein hai. allaah sarvagy, bahut sahanasheel hai
